subcontent: The North Country’s Premiere Apartment Community

content: Both Erin Heights and Erin Court are ideally located within the City of Plattsburgh. The properties are in close proximity to the area’s commercial district, as well as health care, education and religious institutions, while at the same time, affording Erin Court residents seclusion and privacy. The property also provides beautiful grounds comprised of attractive landscaping, trees and a brick perimeter.
